author: Mike Colias
title: GM to Kill Chevrolet Sonic Subcompact Car
text:
General Motors Co. will end production of the Chevrolet Sonic subcompact car as early as this year, according to people familiar with the matter, part of a broader push by Detroit auto executives to abandon low-margin cars in favor of sport-utility vehicles.

Long thought to be necessary for combating Japanese rivals and catering to budget-minded or young customers, passenger cars have fallen out of favor amid low gasoline prices and efficiency improvements in SUVs.
